name: Onions and Dungeons
description:
ONIONS AND DUNGEONS

Fantasy RPG Dungeon Crawler with Cooking Minigames.

Made by a team of 2nd year game students. Team 2:2 AKA Inactive Homies.

Onions and Dungeons is a top-down dungeon crawler. The player must explore the lich’s dungeon killing enemies, solving minigames and finally encountering the lich and beating him in a cook off.

Defeat the evil lich in a 1 on 1 cook off. Complete the minigames, earn a score and hope the time doesn’t run out.

Collect notes spread out around the map and unlock new information about the lich and its history.

The great lich chef, stole all the flavour of the world and stored it within the “onion of life”. A talented chef enters the trial tower created by the lich in hopes to return flavour to the world and defeat the evil lich. Explore the map and learn about the heroic rise of Basil as he uses a fragment of the onions of life to rescue his father from the evil clutches of the lich.
